org.efaps.db.databases.information

Class TableInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.databases.information.TableInformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CacheObjectInterface

    public class TableInformation
extends Object
implements CacheObjectInterface, Serializable
    Class used to return information about a SQL table.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableInformation(String _tableName)
      Initialize this table information instance for given _tableName.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addColInfo(String _colName, Set<AbstractDatabase.ColumnType> _colTypes, int _size, int _scale, boolean _isNullable)
      Appends the column information for given values for column _colName.
      void addForeignKey(String _fkName, String _colName, String _refTableName, String _refColName, boolean _cascade)
      Fetches all foreign keys for this table.
      void addUniqueKeyColumn(String _ukName, int _colIndex, String _colName)
      Adds an unique key information to this table information.
      ColumnInformation getColInfo(String _columnName)
      Returns for given column name (of the SQL table) the column information.
      ForeignKeyInformation getFKInfo(String _fkName)
      Returns for given name of foreign key _fkName (of the SQL table) the information about the foreign key, or if the given name of foreign key is not defined, a null is returned.
      long getId()
      An id does not exists for the table information and so an error will be always thrown if this method is called.
      String getName()
      Returns the table name.
      UniqueKeyInformation getUKInfo(String _ukName)
      Returns for given name of unique key (of the SQL table) the information about the unique key, or if the given name of unique key is not defined, a null is returned.
      UniqueKeyInformation getUKInfoByColNames(String _ukColName)
      Returns for given name of unique key _ukColName (of the SQL table) the information about the unique key, or if the given name of unique key is not defined, a null is returned.
      UUID getUUID()
      An UUID does not exists for the table information and so an error will be always thrown if this method is called.
      String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this class instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableInformation

        public TableInformation(String _tableName)
        Initialize this table information instance for given _tableName.
        Parameters:
        _tableName - name of SQL table for which the information is searched

    • Method Detail

      • addColInfo

        public void addColInfo(String _colName,
              Set<AbstractDatabase.ColumnType> _colTypes,
              int _size,
              int _scale,
              boolean _isNullable)
        Appends the column information for given values for column _colName.
        Parameters:
        _colName - name of the column
        _colTypes - eFaps types of the column
        _size - size (for character)
        _scale - scale (for number)
        _isNullable - is the column nullable?
        See Also:
        colMap

      • addUniqueKeyColumn

        public void addUniqueKeyColumn(String _ukName,
                      int _colIndex,
                      String _colName)
        Adds an unique key information to this table information.
        Parameters:
        _ukName - name of unique key
        _colIndex - index of the column for given unique key
        _colName - name of the column for given unique key
        See Also:
        ukMap, ukColMap

      • addForeignKey

        public void addForeignKey(String _fkName,
                 String _colName,
                 String _refTableName,
                 String _refColName,
                 boolean _cascade)
        Fetches all foreign keys for this table.
        Parameters:
        _fkName - name of foreign key
        _colName - name of column name
        _refTableName - name of referenced SQL table
        _refColName - name of column within referenced SQL table
        _cascade - delete cascade activated
        See Also:
        fkMap

      • getColInfo

        public ColumnInformation getColInfo(String _columnName)

        Returns for given column name (of the SQL table) the column information. If the column does not exists in the table, a null is returned.

        The name of given column is searched independently of upper and / or lower case.

        Parameters:
        _columnName - name of column for which the column information is searched
        Returns:
        column information for given column name; or null if column does not exists in the table
        See Also:
        colMap

      • getUKInfo

        public UniqueKeyInformation getUKInfo(String _ukName)

        Returns for given name of unique key (of the SQL table) the information about the unique key, or if the given name of unique key is not defined, a null is returned.

        The name of the given unique key is searched independently of upper and / or lower case.

        Parameters:
        _ukName - name of unique key which is searched
        Returns:
        unique key information
        See Also:
        ukMap

      • getUKInfoByColNames

        public UniqueKeyInformation getUKInfoByColNames(String _ukColName)

        Returns for given name of unique key _ukColName (of the SQL table) the information about the unique key, or if the given name of unique key is not defined, a null is returned.

        The name of the given unique key is searched independently of upper and / or lower case.

        Parameters:
        _ukColName - name of column names for which the unique key is searched
        Returns:
        unique key information
        See Also:
        ukColMap

      • getFKInfo

        public ForeignKeyInformation getFKInfo(String _fkName)

        Returns for given name of foreign key _fkName (of the SQL table) the information about the foreign key, or if the given name of foreign key is not defined, a null is returned.

        The name of the given foreign key is searched independently of upper and / or lower case.

        Parameters:
        _fkName - name of foreign key which is searched
        Returns:
        foreign key information
        See Also:
        fkMap

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this class instance. The information includes name, colMap, ukMap and fkMap.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this table information

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the table name.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface CacheObjectInterface
        Returns:
        table name
        See Also:
        name

      • getId

        public long getId()
        An id does not exists for the table information and so an error will be always thrown if this method is called. The method is only required to implement interface CacheObjectInterface,
        Specified by:
        getId in interface CacheObjectInterface
        Returns:
        nothing because an error will be always thrown

      • getUUID

        public UUID getUUID()
        An UUID does not exists for the table information and so an error will be always thrown if this method is called. The method is only required to implement interface CacheObjectInterface,
        Specified by:
        getUUID in interface CacheObjectInterface
        Returns:
        nothing because an error will be always thrown
